1.content: Katie was 6'0 tall 14 years old and the most popular girl in babe's high school class. All he ever wanted was to be with her but he knew he never had a chance. One day ...

12.content: He saw that Katie had a lot of books to carry to her next class and that she was struggling with them so he said," You need any help?". Katie's response was rather surprising when she blushed and look down at Babe and replied yes.
12.title: Babe walked up to Katie

121.content: Babe could hardly believe that he was escorting this beautiful amazon. He could barely keep his eyes off of her. He could practically smell her beauty. They talked about random crap and shared stories with each other on their way to class. When they got there Katie had stopped in front of Babe and pinned him against the door. She leaned in close and in a very sexy tone whispered in Babe's ear and said,"I like you hehe." Babe almost fainted when he heard those words coming from the most amazing woman he had ever met. Katie then leaned in closer and gave Babe a little peck on the cheek and said,"Meet me by the library after school, I want to give you a ride home." Then she left before Babe could react.
121.title: Babe walks Katie to class

1211.content: Right after the last bell Babe rushed out of his classroom to go meet Katie at the library. His heart was beating so fast he could hardly wait to see her. Sure enough right when she caught sight of him she smiled and waved. She asked,"Hey, do you want to come back to my house to study tonight?" Babe of course said yes. When they were walking Katie slowly grabbed Babe's hand. When Babe looked up at her she was blushing like the ripest of cherries. He asked her,"Ummm Katie? Do you like me?" She said,"Babe you are one of the cutest guys I know, how could I ever not like you." At that they drove off to Katie's house.
1211.title: @ the library after school

12111.content: When they got back Katie immediately leaned in and kissed Babe again, this time on the lips. Then they went inside and studied. They did this every Wednesday of the week. One Wednesday Babe noticed something different about Katie, but could not quite put his finger on what is was. Was she ...
12111.title: Later @ Katie's house

121111.content: Babe asked Katie if she was wearing heels for he could not take his eyes off of her beautiful body. Katie said,"No, hehe." Babe replied,"Well something about you is different sweety, I just can't point out what it is." That's when it struck Babe, Katie had grown at least two inches taller since the last time that he met with her. Her neck used to be about level with his nose, but now the top of her bosom was level with his nose. She was now 6'2" tall! She said,"Oh good! I'm glad you finally noticed shorty, hehe, and this is only the beginning of my growth spurt according to the doctor." All Babe could think to himself was how truly amazing Katie was and how lucky he was to be with her. Her feet even grew bigger. They were now size 13 mens!
121111.title: Taller?

choices: A New Year, A New ... Height?
1211111.content: When summer vacation came around Katie had to leave town for some camps and she would be gone all summer. Babe was extremely disappointed about this, but understood that Katie had a life other than him. On the last day of school Katie wore her tallest heels to please Babe. After school they went to the park and made out one last time before Katie had to leave for the summer. When Katie waved goodbye Babe was almost in tears that he had to watch her go. Little did he know what is to be in store for him at the beginning of next school year though.
1211111.title: Summer Vacation

12111111.content: At the beginning of the new school year Babe was really happy to be back to school to see Katie. He kept waiting for her by the doors to the school but finally had to go to his first period class because the bell had rung. He was a little concerned about Katie because usually last year she would show up to school right on time every day but today she was late... About ten minutes into class there was a knock on the door and Babe's teacher Mr. Williams went to see who it was. When he opened the door a new girl was standing in the doorway that was absolutely giant. She was even bigger than Katie with her head even above the door frame.
12111111.title: A New Year, A New ... Height?

121111111.content: Surprisingly the new girl immediately looked over to Babe and smiled and winked at him like she knew him. Babe was positive though that he did not know this new beautiful giantess. The girl sat down next to Babe nearly breaking her seat with her giantess weight. Her feet were absolutely enormous too. While Babe was taking in this sight the girl leaned in and said,"Did you miss me Babe?" That was weird, why did the girl's voice sound familiar... No!!! It couldn't be? "Katie?" asked Babe. She said," Yes sweety?" At that moment Babe's heart went into overdrive and he leaned in and kissed his girlfriend's giant hand. He asked,"How tall are you now sweety?" ...
121111111.title: Katie?

1211111111.content:
7' 4'' replied Katie, to which Babe almost fainted. "Katie how did you get this tall?, I thought you were done growing" "I'm just a growing girl I guess" she said "Besides I like being this tall. Just then the bell rang "Well come-on little man let's go" "Ok" Babe whimpered as Katie rose to her full height

Where did they go?
1211111111.title: New Measurements

info.brief_description: Babe was just an ordinary boy growing up and attended East Highschool.
info.description: Babe was just an ordinary boy growing up and attended East High School. He wasn't very popular among the ladies and never even dreamed of dating some of them. His freshman year at East High was extremely boring. Even though he was a straight A student he was also hoping that there would be a gal for him at the high school. Near the middle of the year he noticed a new girl who's name was Katie. Katie was ...
